Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPhone and I love it. I've always been droid or blackberry fan but I can honestly say the iPhone has won me over.

Reviews.Title: Amazon has been filling orders for a new factory sealed iphone with a used open box item... shady, multiple customers decieved
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Item description a flat out lie, "Brand new Factory Sealed" not sealed, not brand new... I will add pictures if I need to. Disappointed, any reply from Amazon that goes past a "we're sorry and we don't lie to the customer again." will just highlight the shady practice. Not nice.Taking a look at orders for new factory sealed iphone 4 8gb that were filled by Amazon I notice that this isn't an isolated incident. going back 6 months, this happened to 5 different customers including myself. Terrible business practice. I do not fault Planet Mobile since Amazon is clearly knowingly filling this new factory dealed description with a used, scratched opened box iphone.

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness - Amazon really came through
Reviews.Author: Lisa J.
Reviews.Content: For Christmas I bought my son a "refurbished" iPhone from another seller. It arrived in plenty of time for the big day and looked great. Unfortunately when we attempted to activate that phone the carrier said it showed as stolen. Of course we were all a little heartbroken.I immediately contacted Amazon about the issue. Within 3 days I had my refund and another iPhone. The new phone looks new and works like a dream. Thank you Amazon for the fast refund so we could repurchase the gift.

Reviews.Title: Apple iphone
Reviews.Author: GRANNY
Reviews.Content: Bought for Grandaughter. It is working very good for her and so far she has been able to protect it with other items bought.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone Exactly how described
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and new that it was used. . When I got it it was in the box and still had the screen protectors on it. I turned the phone on and activated it with no problem. I love my iPhone and got it at a great price. Thanks So much!!!

Reviews.Title: Mom loves it
Reviews.Author: Kagato
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my mom because her old phone was absurdly outdated and she needed something functional but very simple.  For my mom who is in her 60's, this phone (which still has iOS 6 and I will not upgrade) is perfect.  Easy to make calls, a good way to teach her texting and for someone that doesn't really have too many uses for a phone aside from that this 8gig  version is a dream come true and not too expensive.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: roselark
Reviews.Content: I have a MacBook Air and an Apple I pad, so I wanted to sync everything together.Don't need a highly technical phone and this fit the bill.
